metadata.inclusion:
1. Swipe down to access Settings
2. Touch Advanced Settings
3. Enter code
4. Touch Installation
5. Touch Devices
6. Touch Z-Wave Devices
7. Touch Add Device
8. Touch Pair
9. Press pair or learn button on device
metadata.exclusion:
1. Swipe down to access Settings
2. Touch Advanced Settings
3. Enter code
4. Touch Installation
5. Touch Devices
6. Touch Z-Wave Devices
7. Touch Delete failed device from panel
8. Check boxes next to devices you want to delete
9. Touch Delete
metadata.reset:
1. Swipe down from the top of the screen
2. Touch Settings
3. Touch Advanced Settings
4. Enter installer code
5. Touch Installation
6. Touch Devices
7. Touch Z-Wave Devices
8. Touch Remove All Devices
9. Touch Yes to confirm
